member.name: T:WUSTL.EMed.AspNet.WebApi.AntiForgery.Http.AddAntiForgeryTokenCookieAttribute
member.summary: An ASP.NET Web API filter attribute that will set an anti-forgery token cookie on responses.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the antiforgery token cookie to set.

member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the antiforgery token cookie to set.

member.name: T:WUSTL.EMed.AspNet.WebApi.AntiForgery.Http.ValidateAntiForgeryTokenAttribute
member.summary: An ASP.NET Web API filter attribute that will validate an anti-forgery token header on requests.

member.name: P:WUSTL.EMed.AspNet.WebApi.AntiForgery.Http.ValidateAntiForgeryTokenAttribute.HeaderName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the antiforgery token header to validate.

member.name: P:WUSTL.EMed.AspNet.WebApi.AntiForgery.Http.ValidateAntiForgeryTokenAttribute.MissingMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the message returned if the token header is missing.
